column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I just left full
column3: I am a hard lady to impress when it comes to steak houses. Typically
column4: I'd do a hard pass. Made reservations for 5pm
column5: arrived at 4:45pm and was seated right away. This isn't my first time in Chicago but this is my first time at this restaurant
column6: our waiter Erik H. was outstanding! He was Top 3 best waiters I've ever encountered
column8: always checking in to ensure we were happy & such pleasant conversations! The ambiance of the restaurant was lovely. Everyone was very kind & great customer service. Can't wait to come back
